[vc_row][vc_column][dt_gap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_bottom=”20″][vc_column animation=”fade-in”][dt_fancy_title title=”ENGINEERING AND DISTRIBUTION OF POLYESTER TANKS” title_size=”h3″ title_color=”custom” el_width=”100″ title_bg=”enabled” separator_color=”custom” custom_title_color=”#ffffff” custom_separator_color=”#1e73be”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_top=”20″ animation=”left-to-right”][vc_column width=”1/2″][dt_gap height=”40″][layerslider_vc id=”2″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ animation=”right-to-left”][vc_column_text][dt_gap height=”30″ /] SOCAP has more than 50 years of experience dedicated to providing solutions for the manufacture of storage tanks.

OIL INDUSTRY DIVISION

SOCAP is the undisputed market leader concerning double-wall polyester tanks for the storage of hydrocarbon fuels.

INDUSTRIAL DIVISION

SOCAP designs, manufactures and commercialises equipment for the storage and handling of all types of chemical, food, water fluids and especially for all hazardous, toxic and corrosive products.

ENVIRONMENTAL DIVISION

Within the Environmental sector, SOCAP works in three main fields: storage of hazardous products, treatment of waste water and the collection and treatment of solid waste.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][dt_gap height=”40″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_bottom=”20″][vc_column animation=”fade-in”][dt_fancy_title title=”OUR OFFER” title_size=”h3″ title_color=”custom” el_width=”100″ title_bg=”enabled” separator_color=”custom” custom_title_color=”#ffffff” custom_separator_color=”#1e73be”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row animation=”left-to-right”][vc_column width=”1/3″ animation=”right-to-left”][dt_fancy_title title=”50 YEARS working with POLYESTER” title_size=”h4″ title_color=”custom” el_width=”100″ title_bg=”enabled” separator_color=”accent” custom_title_color=”#ffffff”][dt_gap height=”40″][vc_column_text]Our Company has been over 50 years of experience dedicated to providing solutions for the manufacture of storage tanks.
